content: ✿ tiny t-rex tiny t-rex ✿ tiny t-rex plush this fierce little tyrannosaurus thinks he s king of the continent his big feet help him balance as he explores the jungle and other dangerous terrain like bookshelves and garden stools it s a mighty big world out there for someone so small your plush pattern notes prehistoric everything is worked in continuous rounds unless stated otherwise finished product measures approximately 8 tall and 7 across depending on pal yarn gauge and brand gauge isn t vital the stitches just need to be dense enough to keep the stuffing in place materials worsted weight yarn in three colors seen with colour a as green colour b as cream colour c as red 4mm crochet hook needle with large eye toy stuffing white felt black & white fabric paint small amount of black yarn abbreviations double_crochet = double_crochet chain = chain decrease = decrease insert hook into front loop of the next stitch 2 loops on hook then through the front loop of the next stitch 3 loops on hook yo and pull through 2 loops yo and pull through all loops yo = yarn over hook increase = increase double_crochet 2 in next st slip_stitch = slip_stitch ›› 32 creative craft series amigurumi creative craft series amigurumi 33 ✿ tiny t-rex tiny t-rex ✿ attach the head with the yarn tail pin the belly to find the placement the toes ready to crochet together a & b double_crochet across half the third toe then across half the second to attach them together c double_crochet 12 around the entire remaining toe head using colour a round 1 chain 2 6 double_crochet in second chain from hook round 2 increase in each st 12 round 3 double_crochet increase repeat 18 round 4 double_crochet 2 increase repeat 24 round 5 double_crochet 3 increase repeat 30 round 6 double_crochet 4 increase repeat 36 round 7 double_crochet 5 increase repeat 42 round 8 double_crochet 6 increase repeat 48 round 9-15 double_crochet around 7 rnds round 16 double_crochet 14 decrease double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 14 45 round 17 double_crochet around 45 d finish connecting the toes the foot starting to take shape round 18 double_crochet 16 decrease double_crochet 9 decrease double_crochet 16 43 round 19 double_crochet around 43 round 20 double_crochet 16 decrease double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 16 41 round 31 double_crochet 6 decrease repeat 42 round 3 double_crochet increase repeat 18 round 21 double_crochet 15 decrease double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 15 39 round 32 double_crochet around 42 round 4 double_crochet 2 increase repeat 24 round 22 double_crochet around 39 round 33 double_crochet 5 decrease repeat 36 round 5 double_crochet 3 increase repeat 30 round 23 double_crochet 13 increase double_crochet 3 repeat 3 times increase round 34 double_crochet 4 decrease repeat 30 round 6 double_crochet 4 increase repeat 36 double_crochet 13 43 round 35 double_crochet 3 decrease repeat 24 round 7 double_crochet 5 increase repeat 42 if using safety eyes insert them around stuff
